verses.verse: Against Moab <S%H4124><s%> thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>, the 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>; Woe <S%H1945><s%> unto N'vo <S%H5015><s%> ! for it is spoiled <S%H7703><s%> <S%H8795><s%>: Kiriathaim <S%H7156><s%> is confounded <S%H3001><s%> <S%H8689><s%> and taken <S%H3920><s%> <S%H8738><s%>: Misgab <S%H4869><s%> is confounded <S%H3001><s%> <S%H8689><s%> and dismayed <S%H2865><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

There shall be no more praise <S%H8416><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>: in Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> they have devised <S%H2803><s%> <S%H8804><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> against it; come <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, and let us cut it off <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8686><s%> from being a nation <S%H1471><s%>. Also thou shalt be cut down <S%H1826><s%> <S%H8735><s%>, O Madmen <S%H4086><s%>; the sword <S%H2719><s%> shall pursue <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee <S%H310><s%>.
A voice <S%H6963><s%> of crying <S%H6818><s%> shall be from Horonaim <S%H2773><s%>, spoiling <S%H7701><s%> and great <S%H1419><s%> destruction <S%H7667><s%>.
Moab <S%H4124><s%> is destroyed <S%H7665><s%> <S%H8738><s%>; her little ones <S%H6810><s%> have caused a cry <S%H2201><s%> to be heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8689><s%>.

For in the going up <S%H4608><s%> of Luhith <S%H3872><s%> continual <S%H1065><s%> weeping <S%H1065><s%> shall go up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; for in the going down <S%H4174><s%> of Horonaim <S%H2773><s%> the enemies <S%H6862><s%> have heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a cry <S%H6818><s%> of destruction <S%H7667><s%>.
Flee <S%H5127><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, save <S%H4422><s%> <S%H8761><s%> your lives <S%H5315><s%>, and be <S%H1961><s%> <S%H8799><s%> like the heath <S%H6176><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>.

For because thou hast trusted <S%H982><s%> <S%H8800><s%> in thy works <S%H4639><s%> and in thy treasures <S%H214><s%>, thou shalt also be taken <S%H3920><s%> <S%H8735><s%>: and K'mosh <S%H3645><s%> shall go forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8804><s%> into captivity <S%H1473><s%> with his Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> and his princes <S%H8269><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>.

And the spoiler <S%H7703><s%> <S%H8802><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon every city <S%H5892><s%>, and no city <S%H5892><s%> shall escape <S%H4422><s%> <S%H8735><s%>: the valley <S%H6010><s%> also shall perish <S%H6><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and the plain <S%H4334><s%> shall be destroyed <S%H8045><s%> <S%H8738><s%>, as the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath spoken <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

Give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8798><s%> wings <S%H6731><s%> unto Moab <S%H4124><s%>, that it may flee <S%H5323><s%> <S%H8800><s%> and get away <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: for the cities <S%H5892><s%> thereof shall be desolate <S%H8047><s%>, without any to dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> therein <S%H2004><s%>.

Cursed <S%H779><s%> <S%H8803><s%> be he that doeth <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the work <S%H4399><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> deceitfully <S%H7423><s%>, and cursed <S%H779><s%> <S%H8803><s%> be he that keepeth back <S%H4513><s%> <S%H8802><s%> his sword <S%H2719><s%> from blood <S%H1818><s%>.

Moab <S%H4124><s%> hath been at ease <S%H7599><s%> <S%H8768><s%> from his youth <S%H5271><s%>, and he hath settled <S%H8252><s%> <S%H8802><s%> on his lees <S%H8105><s%>, and hath not been emptied <S%H7324><s%> <S%H8717><s%> from vessel <S%H3627><s%> to vessel <S%H3627><s%>, neither hath he gone <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%> into captivity <S%H1473><s%>: therefore his taste <S%H2940><s%> remained <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in him, and his scent <S%H7381><s%> is not changed <S%H4171><s%> <S%H8738><s%>.

Therefore, behold, the days <S%H3117><s%> come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, that I will send <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8765><s%> unto him wanderers <S%H6808><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, that shall cause him to wander <S%H6808><s%> <S%H8765><s%>, and shall empty <S%H7324><s%> <S%H8686><s%> his vessels <S%H3627><s%>, and break <S%H5310><s%> <S%H8762><s%> their bottles <S%H5035><s%>.

And Moab <S%H4124><s%> shall be ashamed <S%H954><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of K'mosh <S%H3645><s%>, as the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> was ashamed <S%H954><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of Beit-El <S%H1008><s%> their confidence <S%H4009><s%>.
How say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> ye, We are mighty <S%H1368><s%> and strong <S%H2428><s%> men <S%H582><s%> for the war <S%H4421><s%> ?

Moab <S%H4124><s%> is spoiled <S%H7703><s%> <S%H8795><s%>, and gone up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8804><s%> out of her cities <S%H5892><s%>, and his chosen <S%H4005><s%> young men <S%H970><s%> are gone down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to the slaughter <S%H2874><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the King <S%H4428><s%>, whose name <S%H8034><s%> is the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>.
The calamity <S%H343><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> is near <S%H7138><s%> to come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, and his affliction <S%H7451><s%> hasteth <S%H4116><s%> <S%H8765><s%> fast <S%H3966><s%>.

All ye that are about <S%H5439><s%> him, bemoan <S%H5110><s%> <S%H8798><s%> him; and all ye that know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8802><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%>, say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, How is the strong <S%H5797><s%> staff <S%H4294><s%> broken <S%H7665><s%> <S%H8738><s%>, and the beautiful <S%H8597><s%> rod <S%H4731><s%> !

Thou daughter <S%H1323><s%> that dost inhabit <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> Dibon <S%H1769><s%>, come down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8798><s%> from thy glory <S%H3519><s%>, and sit <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8798><s%> in thirst <S%H6772><s%>; for the spoiler <S%H7703><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> shall come <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8804><s%> upon thee, and he shall destroy <S%H7843><s%> <S%H8765><s%> thy strong holds <S%H4013><s%>.

O inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Aroer <S%H6177><s%>, stand <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8798><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%>, and espy <S%H6822><s%> <S%H8761><s%>; ask <S%H7592><s%> <S%H8798><s%> him that fleeth <S%H5127><s%> <S%H8801><s%>, and her that escapeth <S%H4422><s%> <S%H8737><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, What is done <S%H1961><s%> <S%H8738><s%> ?

Moab <S%H4124><s%> is confounded <S%H3001><s%> <S%H8689><s%>; for it is broken down <S%H2865><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: howl <S%H3213><s%> <S%H8685><s%> and cry <S%H2199><s%> <S%H8798><s%>; tell <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8685><s%> ye it in Arnon <S%H769><s%>, that Moab <S%H4124><s%> is spoiled <S%H7703><s%> <S%H8795><s%>,

And judgment <S%H4941><s%> is come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> upon the plain <S%H4334><s%> country <S%H776><s%>; upon Holon <S%H2473><s%>, and upon YAHazah <S%H3096><s%>, and upon Mephaath <S%H4158><s%>,
And upon Dibon <S%H1769><s%>, and upon N'vo <S%H5015><s%>, and upon Bethdiblathaim <S%H1015><s%>,
And upon Kiriathaim <S%H7156><s%>, and upon Bethgamul <S%H1014><s%>, and upon Bethmeon <S%H1010><s%>,
And upon Kerioth <S%H7152><s%>, and upon Bozrah <S%H1224><s%>, and upon all the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>, far <S%H7350><s%> or near <S%H7138><s%>.

The shofar <S%H7161><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> is cut off <S%H1438><s%> <S%H8738><s%>, and his arm <S%H2220><s%> is broken <S%H7665><s%> <S%H8738><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

Make ye him drunken <S%H7937><s%> <S%H8685><s%>: for he magnified <S%H1431><s%> <S%H8689><s%> himself against the YY <S%H3068><s%>: Moab <S%H4124><s%> also shall wallow <S%H5606><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in his vomit <S%H6892><s%>, and he also shall be in derision <S%H7814><s%>.

For was not Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> a derision <S%H7814><s%> unto thee? was he found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8738><s%> among thieves <S%H1590><s%>? for since <S%H1767><s%> thou spakest <S%H1697><s%> of him, thou skippedst <S%H5110><s%> <S%H8709><s%> for joy.

O ye that dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in Moab <S%H4124><s%>, leave <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%>, and dwell <S%H7931><s%> <S%H8798><s%> in the rock <S%H5553><s%>, and be like the dove <S%H3123><s%> that maketh her nest <S%H7077><s%> <S%H8762><s%> in the sides <S%H5676><s%> of the hole's <S%H6354><s%> mouth <S%H6310><s%>.

We have heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the pride <S%H1347><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>, (he <S%H1931><s%> is exceeding <S%H3966><s%> proud <S%H1343><s%> ) his loftiness <S%H1363><s%>, and his arrogancy <S%H1346><s%>, and his pride <S%H1347><s%>, and the haughtiness <S%H7312><s%> of his heart <S%H3820><s%>.

I know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> his wrath <S%H5678><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>; but it shall not be so; his lies <S%H907><s%> shall not so effect <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it.

Therefore will I howl <S%H3213><s%> <S%H8686><s%> for Moab <S%H4124><s%>, and I will cry out <S%H2199><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for all Moab <S%H4124><s%>; mine heart shall mourn <S%H1897><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for the men <S%H582><s%> of Kirheres <S%H7025><s%>.

O vine <S%H1612><s%> of Sibmah <S%H7643><s%>, I will weep <S%H1058><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for thee with the weeping <S%H1065><s%> of Jazer <S%H3270><s%>: thy plants <S%H5189><s%> are gone over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%>, they reach <S%H5060><s%> <S%H8804><s%> even to the sea <S%H3220><s%> of Jazer <S%H3270><s%>: the spoiler <S%H7703><s%> <S%H8802><s%> is fallen <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8804><s%> upon thy summer fruits <S%H7019><s%> and upon thy vintage <S%H1210><s%>.

And joy <S%H8057><s%> and gladness <S%H1524><s%> is taken <S%H622><s%> <S%H8738><s%> from the plentiful field <S%H3759><s%>, and from the land <S%H776><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>; and I have caused wine <S%H3196><s%> to fail <S%H7673><s%> <S%H8689><s%> from the winepresses <S%H3342><s%>: none shall tread <S%H1869><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with shouting <S%H1959><s%>; their shouting <S%H1959><s%> shall be no shouting <S%H1959><s%>.

From the cry <S%H2201><s%> of Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> even unto Elealeh <S%H500><s%>, and even unto YAHaz <S%H3096><s%>, have they uttered <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> their voice <S%H6963><s%>, from Zoar <S%H6820><s%> even unto Horonaim <S%H2773><s%>, as an heifer <S%H5697><s%> of three years old <S%H7992><s%>: for the waters <S%H4325><s%> also of Nimrim <S%H5249><s%> shall be desolate <S%H4923><s%>.

Moreover I will cause to cease <S%H7673><s%> <S%H8689><s%> in Moab <S%H4124><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, him that offereth <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8688><s%> in the high places <S%H1116><s%>, and him that burneth incense <S%H6999><s%> <S%H8688><s%> to his 'elohim <S%H430><s%>.

Therefore mine heart <S%H3820><s%> shall sound <S%H1993><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for Moab <S%H4124><s%> like pipes <S%H2485><s%>, and mine heart <S%H3820><s%> shall sound <S%H1993><s%> <S%H8799><s%> like pipes <S%H2485><s%> for the men <S%H582><s%> of Kirheres <S%H7025><s%>: because the riches <S%H3502><s%> that he hath gotten <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> are perished <S%H6><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

For every head <S%H7218><s%> shall be bald <S%H7144><s%>, and every beard <S%H2206><s%> clipped <S%H1639><s%> <S%H8803><s%>: upon all the hands <S%H3027><s%> shall be cuttings <S%H1417><s%>, and upon the loins <S%H4975><s%> sackcloth <S%H8242><s%>.

There shall be lamentation <S%H4553><s%> generally upon all the housetops <S%H1406><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>, and in the streets <S%H7339><s%> thereof: for I have broken <S%H7665><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Moab <S%H4124><s%> like a vessel <S%H3627><s%> wherein is no pleasure <S%H2656><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

They shall howl <S%H3213><s%> <S%H8685><s%>, saying, How is it broken down <S%H2865><s%> <S%H8804><s%> ! how hath Moab <S%H4124><s%> turned <S%H6437><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the back <S%H6203><s%> with shame <S%H954><s%> <S%H8804><s%> ! so shall Moab <S%H4124><s%> be a derision <S%H7814><s%> and a dismaying <S%H4288><s%> to all them about <S%H5439><s%> him.

For thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>; Behold, he shall fly <S%H1675><s%> <S%H8799><s%> as an eagle <S%H5404><s%>, and shall spread <S%H6566><s%> <S%H8804><s%> his wings <S%H3671><s%> over Moab <S%H4124><s%>.

Kerioth <S%H7152><s%> is taken <S%H3920><s%> <S%H8738><s%>, and the strong holds <S%H4679><s%> are surprised <S%H8610><s%> <S%H8738><s%>, and the mighty men's <S%H1368><s%> hearts <S%H3820><s%> in Moab <S%H4124><s%> at that day <S%H3117><s%> shall be as the heart <S%H3820><s%> of a woman <S%H802><s%> in her pangs <S%H6887><s%> <S%H8688><s%>.
And Moab <S%H4124><s%> shall be destroyed <S%H8045><s%> <S%H8738><s%> from being a people <S%H5971><s%>, because he hath magnified <S%H1431><s%> <S%H8689><s%> himself against the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

Fear <S%H6343><s%>, and the pit <S%H6354><s%>, and the snare <S%H6341><s%>, shall be upon thee, O inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

He that fleeth <S%H5127><s%> <S%H8801><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H5211><s%> from <S%H6440><s%> the fear <S%H6343><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into the pit <S%H6354><s%>; and he that getteth up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8802><s%> out of the pit <S%H6354><s%> shall be taken <S%H3920><s%> <S%H8735><s%> in the snare <S%H6341><s%>: for I will bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> upon it, even upon Moab <S%H4124><s%>, the year <S%H8141><s%> of their visitation <S%H6486><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

They that fled <S%H5127><s%> <S%H8801><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8804><s%> under the shadow <S%H6738><s%> of Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> because of the force <S%H3581><s%>: but a fire <S%H784><s%> shall come forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8804><s%> out of Heshbon <S%H2809><s%>, and a flame <S%H3852><s%> from the midst <S%H996><s%> of Sichon <S%H5511><s%>, and shall devour <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the corner <S%H6285><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>, and the crown of the head <S%H6936><s%> of the tumultuous <S%H7588><s%> ones <S%H1121><s%>.

Woe <S%H188><s%> be unto thee, O Moab <S%H4124><s%> ! the people <S%H5971><s%> of K'mosh <S%H3645><s%> perisheth <S%H6><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: for thy sons <S%H1121><s%> are taken <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8795><s%> captives <S%H7628><s%>, and thy daughters <S%H1323><s%> captives <S%H7633><s%>.

Yet will I bring again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the captivity <S%H7622><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> in the latter <S%H319><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>. Thus far <S%H2008><s%> is the judgment <S%H4941><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>.
